dict.acceptation: 抚养，赡养(+for)；做准备；预约(for 或 against)；

sent.orig: In general, the shop provide general adjustment complimentarily. Sure, we provide free adjustment service at shop.
sent.trans: 一般的松紧调校，大多数的眼镜店可以对此提供免费服务。当然，我们也有提供免费眼镜调校服务。

sent.orig: Landmarginal land. They grown grow fast and provide provide good quality wood.
sent.trans: 他们生长的快，而且还可以提供高质量的木材。

sent.orig: C. Provide leadership and coordination for lean manufacturing projects. Set expectations, provide continuity standards.
sent.trans: 领导和协调精益生产制造项目，设定目标，设置持续高标准。

sent.orig: Provide online support to make sure no line down. Provide related improvement action every day.
sent.trans: 在线支持确保不停线，每天提供有效改善措施。

sent.orig: In essence, you provide the content, we will provide the structure and guidance.
sent.trans: 本质上来说，你提出想法，我们将提供架构和指导。
